titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the The life of the lakes [videorecording] : the Great Lakes fishery / Michigan Sea Grant, Michigan State University ; with Sylvia Earle.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: The life of the lakes [videorecording] : the Great Lakes fishery / Michigan Sea Grant, Michigan State University ; with Sylvia Earle.

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: [East Lansing, MI] : Michigan State University, c1993.

odd.head: Varying Form of Title
odd.p: Title on cassette label: Life of the Great Lakes

odd.head: Creation/Production Credits
odd.p: Executive producer: John D. Schwartz ; producer and director: Carol Y. Swinehart.

archdesc.scopecontent: Dr. Earle discusses the Great Lakes as a fishery. She includes current and historical conditions and patterns and ecological problems connected with the lakes and their fish.
